Comment: A unique ID for the record.
The date and time when the transaction took place.
The transaction type. Will be one of:0=Sales1=Receipt2=Transfer3=Adjust Out4=Adjust In5=Average Cost Adjustment
ID number of the staff member who entered the transaction.
ID of the narrative on the transaction (entered via manual stock movement).
ID number of the period that the record belongs to.
This is a historical field that has been superseded by the AGE calculated field.
Calculated field that indicates the age the record belongs to.
